bool WatcherPathRequestV1::visit ( Watcher::Mode  ,
const std::string &  label,
const std::string &  desc,
const std::string &  valueStr 
) [virtual]

This method is called once for each child of a directory watcher when the visitChild member is called.

This function can return false to stop any further visits.

See also:
Watcher::visitChildren

Implements WatcherVisitor.
